```{r}
server <- function(input, output, session) {

  
  data <- reactive({
    req(input$file)
    read.csv(input$file$datapath)
  })
  
  output$table <- renderDT({
    datatable(data())
  })
  
  output$plot <- renderPlot({
    graficos[[]]
  })
  

  
  
  observe({
    req(input$file_modelo)
    data_modelo <- read.csv(input$file_modelo$datapath)
    updateSelectInput(session, "variable", choices = names(data_modelo))
  })
  
  output$model_summary <- renderPrint({
    req(input$file_modelo, input$variable, input$run_model)
    data_modelo <- read.csv(input$file_modelo$datapath)
    modelo <- lm(as.formula(paste(input$variable, "~ .")), data = data_modelo)
    summary(modelo)
  })

  
  
  
  
  
  output$mapa <- renderLeaflet({
    leaflet() %>%
      addTiles() %>%
      setView(lng = -0.37739, lat = 39.46975, zoom = 13) %>%
      addCircleMarkers(
        lng = c(-0.3426899,
                -0.37648469,
                -0.40855865,
                -0.37665323,
                -0.3374074,
                -0.40603766,
                -0.32321741,
                -0.32894501),
        lat = c(39.45750439,
                39.47071883,
                39.48113875,
                39.45806013,
                39.47962193,
                39.46923859,
                39.45926486,
                39.45051894),
        label = c(
          "AvenidaFrancia",
          "Centre",
          "MolidelSol",
          "PistadeSilla",
          "UPV",
          "Olivereta",
          "Puerto",
          "LlicAnticTuria"
        ),
        color = "red",
      )
  })
}


```



```{r}
shinyApp(ui = ui, server = server)
```
